name: Paper
tagline: Develop applications for Pythonista using web tools.
body:
Paper is a library that allows Pythonista users to develop aplications using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. # How can I use it? Initialize the library: ```python import paper # Initialize Paper app = paper.app('./app') # Expose the function 'hello' to the JS API @app.expose def hello(): return 'Oh, hi!' # Run your app app.run() ``` Make your app (inside “app” folder): ```html Paper

Hello, Paper!

``` _Voilá._ # How does it work? ### 1. The server: … ### 2. The JS API: … ## Contribute Suggestions, as well as pull requests and bug reports are welcome.
